import React, {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './ProductItem.css' class ProductItem extends Component { render() { let {id, name, price} = this.props.product let image = `http://localhost:8888/${this.props.product.image}` return(
{name}

Rp {parseInt(price).toLocaleString('IN')}

) } } export default ProductItem
